name: Force Telekinesis

banner.text: According to my databanks, The Force is not just about lifting rocks. But that is a good place to start.

steps.grabBlockCopy: Drag the Object: apply force block into the code space.

steps.openFlyoutCopy: When your hand is over the sensor, the objects will be forced upwards ↑. Open the ${toolbox#math} tray to set the strength.
steps.grabBlockCopy: Drag this block into the code space.

steps.openFlyoutCopy: Set the strength of the force based on where your hand is using a Force Kit: height block. Open the ${toolbox#forceKit} tray.
steps.grabBlockCopy: Drag the Force Kit: height block into the code space.

steps.bannerCopy: The Force Kit: height number needs to be made smaller so the objects don't get pushed upwards too strongly. Change + to ÷ divide from the dropdown list.

steps.text: Reach out, put your hand over the sensor and lift.

banner.text: Well done, but I wonder how the other Porgs feel about that.

tooltips.text: Try changing the objects to levitate something else
